name: Chicago Style SEO
description:
Chicago Style SEO is a full service Internet marketing firm. We cover all three aspects of SEO:
technical/on-site SEO
local SEO
organic SEO
We also help set up and manage PPC on many different platforms:
AdWords
Bing Ads
Product feeds
Twitter Ads
Facebook Ads
Retargeting/Remarketing
Outbrain
RSLA
Display ads
Check out out blog for latest Internet marketing news.
